issue.title: [JS] Utilize stream EOS in File format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5438](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5438). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently do not write EOS at the end of a Message stream inside the File format.  As a result, the file cannot be parsed sequentially.  This change prepares for other implementations or future reference features that parse a File sequentially... i.e. without access to seek().
